short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Find local results from Craigslist when searching on Amazon. You get it faster and cheaper while reusing.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When you shop on Amazon and something is available locally on Craigslist, Used surfaces those listings so that you can get what you want faster, often cheaper because it's used, and always more sustainably because you are reusing.
